game.name: Train Simulator: Seaboard GE U36B Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The famous General Electric ‘U-Boat’ comes to Train Simulator in two distinctive Seaboard liveries.General Electric introduced its “Universal Series” diesel road-switchers in 1959, and over the following two decades more than 3,500 “U-Boats” - as the locomotives were nicknamed – were constructed.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The famous General Electric ‘U-Boat’ comes to Train Simulator in two distinctive Seaboard liveries.General Electric introduced its “Universal Series” diesel road-switchers in 1959, and over the following two decades more than 3,500 “U-Boats” - as the locomotives were nicknamed – were constructed.
